description: Local stops on New York City Broadway line (IRT #1) subway.
comments: These are the numbered stops for the #1 train, as of February 2000.
references: Volume 2, page 112, exercise 2, of John L. Casti's Reality Rules: Picturing the World in Mathematics (Wiley, 1992).
James Gleick, Faster, Vintage Books, NY, 2000 (see pp. 259-261).
links: James Gleick, In a 'random world', he collects patterns, New York Times, Tuesday, January 27, 1987, front page of Science Tuesday section.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Line number corrected from #9 to IRT #1 by _Lee A. Newberg_, Sep 09 2010
